- type: checkboxes
    id: prerequisites
    attributes:
      label: 先决条件 (Prerequisites)
      options:
        - label: |
            我已确认这个镜像源从未在 [其他 issues](https://github.com/HUSTLUG/yogurt-sync/issues) 中讨论过。
        required: true

- type: textarea
    id: usage
    attributes:
      label: 用途
    validations:
      required: true

- type: textarea
    id: upstream
    attributes:
      label: 上游仓库地址或同步方式
    validations:
      required: true

- type: textarea
    id: more
    attributes:
      label: 备注
